results.title: Was Cristiano Ronaldo nominated for the 2025 Ballon d'Or? Al Nassr star continues to shine in Saudi Arabia - sportingnews.com
results.content: Image 132: Was Cristiano Ronaldo nominated for the 2025 Ballon d'Or? Al Nassr star continues to shine in Saudi Arabia image Unfortunately, playing outside of Europe has all but eliminated Ronaldo from contention for the Ballon d'Or. While he is technically eligible for the award, as are all professional football players around the world as of 2007, it's almost impossible for someone playing for an Asian club to do enough to gain the respect of the selection committee or the voters — the pedigree of the Saudi Pro League is just not to that level. results.title: Morocco’s opportunities before the 2030 World Cup - The Jerusalem Post
results.content: Morocco’s opportunities before the 2030 World Cup | The Jerusalem Post Image 3:  FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 - Quarter Final - Morocco v Portugal - Al Thumama Stadium, Doha, Qatar - December 10, 2022 Portugal's Bruno Fernandes shoots at goal. Morocco, over the coming years, represents a true “field of opportunities” for investment and business across sectors such as tourism, infrastructure, logistics, innovation, construction, real estate, communications, and the sports industry.
